guides.name: Rachel Worner
guides.bio: With 6 years of experience in mild white water rafting, Rachel is a hard to beat river guide. Rafting is a passion of hers, and she's been on the river since she was 8 years old. Having competed in many national white water rafting competions, she's ranked as high as 2nd in the country in her division. She is fun to be around and great with families.

guides.name: Thomas Draper
guides.bio: Thomas is our best high adventure tour guide, with 13 years of experience, he come prepared for any level of adventure. Whether you're seeking a safe thrilling ride, or a trail a little beyond your comfort level, he's the guide for you. Loves working with young adults and adventure seeking youth groups.

guides.name: Kyle Staheli
guides.bio: Kyle is a great fit if you're seeking a fun ride with a moderate level of intensity. With 8 years of experience, he come prepared for many of the challenges that might be faced while riding the river. He loves working with people of all ages seeking a greater level of adventure.
